full_description:
MeeTion MT-CHR16 Cute Pink Racing E-Sport Gaming Chair

The MeeTion MT-CHR26 is an E-Sport Gaming Chair with 2D Armrest Massage and Footrest. It has a curved neck support headrest that supports the weight of the head. Disperse the strength of the spine, and continue the game without stress. It features a 2D swivel armrest. Can lift up and down rotate left and right. Support the arm for a more comfortable fit. It comes with a massage pillow. Perfect fit to the back curve, good relife for long games. It can be adjusted freely according to different scenes. Pushing the handle can change the angle. Comfortable and enjoyable. The MeeTion MT-CHR26 features a footrest design. No fear of playing or working long hours, relax your feet for better rest. The MeeTion MT-CHR26 has no warranty.
